dbTable.name: _customField
dbTable.description: specification for a custom field in a table for a tenant.

dbField.name: tableName
dbField.description: table name being customized. must match the db table Name

dbField.name: seqNo
dbField.description: 0 is the first field. should not skip fields, except at the end

dbField.name: label
dbField.description: label to be used on the client

dbField.name: valueType
dbField.description: text, integer, decimal, date or boolean

dbField.name: maxLength
dbField.description: maximum character allowed for this field

dbField.name: enumeration
dbField.description: comma separated list of valid values
